queries.name: q_timezone_check
queries.sql: SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE) AS TIMEZONE_NAME FROM M_HOST_INFORMATION WHERE KEY='timezone_name'

actions.description: The timezone does not match on all hosts in the SAP scale-out environment. For stability and supportability reasons, adjust the timezones so they match.

references: SAP HANA Database Checklists and Recommendations,2080216 - Check HANA DB for DST switch,https://me.sap.com/notes/2080216
SAP HANA Database Checklists and Recommendations,3357289 - Error 'Time zone xxxxxx does not exist' for data replication due to country time zone inconsistencies,https://me.sap.com/notes/0003357289
